Question
========
Complete the following sentences: "The Variance Inflation Factor (VIF) is used as a measure for ... . A value ... than 10 is seen as problematic."

Answerlist

* Multicollinearity; larger.
* Homoscedasticity ; larger.
* Multicollinearity ; smaller.
* Homoscedasticity ; smaller.
